scripts.dev: node -e "const os=require('os'); const nets=os.networkInterfaces(); const results={}; for(const name of Object.keys(nets)){ for(const net of nets[name]){ if(net.family==='IPv4' && !net.internal){ console.log('\nðŸš€ Dashboard Network: http://' + net.address + ':3000\n'); } } }" && next dev -H 0.0.0.0
scripts.start: node -e "const os=require('os'); const nets=os.networkInterfaces(); const results={}; for(const name of Object.keys(nets)){ for(const net of nets[name]){ if(net.family==='IPv4' && !net.internal){ console.log('\nðŸš€ Dashboard Network: http://' + net.address + ':3000\n'); } } }" && next start -H 0.0.0.0
